ygData.subject: Re: Some Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Foreman s Tunic DEFINITELY.  It s AC 10 STR 3 WIS 3, but most importantly, weighs nothing! I m still looking for one.  I ve been wearing my Lockjaw Tunic
ygData.messageBody:
> 1) I managed to buy some Cured Silk Armor for a
> relativily low price. So my choice is between Cured
> Silk Gi or Foreman's tunic. Any input?

Foreman's Tunic DEFINITELY. It's AC 10 STR 3 WIS 3, but most importantly,
weighs nothing!

I'm still looking for one. I've been wearing my Lockjaw Tunic since level
13 and I'm level 23 now, and finally starting to get some money back after
spending about 500pp on jewelry. :)

> 2) Where is a good place for a level 20 to hunt.
> From 14-17 I hunted oasis and from 17-20 I hunted East
> Karana. Any recomendations?

I got levels 16-23 in Highpass Hold. You need a group there, but you'll get
levels quite quickly, I found. I also enjoyed the excitement of a free for
all.

> 3) Anyone know a good surname for a Monk named
> Hammeron

Heads?
